DOC.brief_title: Treatment Patterns And Outcomes In Patients Treated With Benefix Or Refacto/Refacto AF - A Swedish Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: The overall aim study describe demographic clinical characteristic , treatment pattern outcomes , well related direct treatment cost population hemophilia patient treat BeneFIX ReFacto/ReFacto AF , subgroup ( e.g . level severity ) MHC Sweden . The study population consist patient diagnose haemophilia ( D66.9 ( haemophilia A ) D67.9 ( haemophilia B ) International Statistical Classification Diseases Related Health Problems ( ICD-10 ) register MHR since 1977 least one registered prescription BeneFIX ReFacto/ReFacto AF MHR since market authorization respective product ( Benefix August 27 1997 , ReFacto April 13 1999 , ReFacto AF July 1 2009 ) . Diseased individual include . Information drug pick pharmacy available Prescribed Drug Register 2005 .
